properties.name: vdisk
properties.description: • vdisk - (Required) The name of the Vdisk that this Access is associated with.

properties.name: host
properties.description: • host - (Required) The fully qualified domain name of the controller this Access is associated with.

properties.name: address
properties.description: • address - (Required) The actual address that this Access is providing access to.

properties.name: type
properties.description: • type - (Required) The type of address provided in address. Can be host, ip or iqn.

properties.name: vdisk
properties.description: • vdisk - (Required) The name of the vdisk the LUN is on.

properties.name: controller
properties.description: • controller - (Required) The fully qualified domain name for the controller that the LUN is to attach to.

properties.name: vdisk
properties.description: • vdisk - (Required) The name of the vdisk the Mount is on.

properties.name: controller
properties.description: • controller - (Required) The fully qualified domain name for the controller that the Mount is to attach to.

properties.name: name
properties.description: • name - (Required) The name to be used by the Vdisk for identification.

properties.name: size
properties.description: • size - (Required) The size of the disk in GB.

properties.name: type
properties.description: • type - (Required) The type of the disk; can be either BLOCK or NFS
